mapper.select: select * from systemValue where status = 'Y' and systemCode=#{systemCode} order by no desc
select code, title from systemValue where systemCode=#{systemCode}
select code from systemValue where code=#{code}
mapper.insert: insert into systemValue ( code, systemCode, title, memo, sort, status ) values ( #{code}, #{systemCode}, #{title}, #{memo}, #{sort}, 'Y' )
mapper.update: update systemValue set code=#{code}, title=#{title}, memo=#{memo}, sort=#{sort} where no = #{no}
